channel.title: Running while comp is on?
channel.description: My computer is on all the time, but the user is changing several times a day. I am looking for a way to make it run which ever user is on. I know to put the file right on the C drive but i need to figure out how to make it run W/O anyone having to turn it on when they logon, can anyone help meh?

item.title: Running while comp is on?
item.dc:creator: @Bigbucks Bigbucks
item.description:
@Bigbucks wrote:

Ok, my stepdad logs on his side of the comp, my sever kicks on. Normally the server bat will come up. I dont want this to happen…how do i do this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 07:22:07 am[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Running while comp is on?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“Bigbucks, post:3, topic:243541”]will like a popup come on of the bat file or can i make it be running but w/o the popup[/quote]The popup should always show.
